title: and Kelly AuCoin from "Billions"
description:
Actor Kelly AuCoin, who plays “Dollar Bill” on Showtime’s “Billions,” shares some behind-the-scenes stories from the hit show along with tales about growing up in DC with a politician dad. He also chronicles his acting journey which included sleeping in the back of his VW bus, a first professional gig in theater, a move to NYC, and shaving his head!  Plus, Lala and Randall answer more of your voicemails questions about their wedding plans, and what it was like for Lala growing up in Utah.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
